column1: * 1917 - Edith Tolkien writes a letter to her husband before leaving Withernsea for Cheltenham.
* 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Nevill Coghill.
* 1961 – An Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien with J.R.R. Tolkien ("Den besynnerlige professor Tolkien") is published in Swedish.
* 1982 – The sixth episode of the new version of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1986 – The Shaping of Middle-earth is published in the UK.

column2: a combination of Oxonmoot 1992 and Mythcon 23

column1: * 2006 – The Oxford Tolkien Conference at wikipedia:Exeter College
* 2007 – The tenth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
